## hpr1377 :: Zareason ZaTab 2 Android Tablet

 

Frank Bell discusses the Zareason ZaTab ZT2 Tablet, an open, rooted Android tablet.                                                                                                                 


ZaTab 2 on the web:  https://zareason.com/shop/ZaTab-ZT2.html


TWUUG Handout about the ZaTab 2 (PDF):  https://pineviewfarm.net/misc/HO_TWUUG_ZaTab.pdf
